item.description:
Hi everyone!!  I can hardly believe it is almost March!!!  I hope everyone has been staying healthy!  Our next potluck is Friday March 2.  Please bring an organic raw vegan dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring...a salad (fruit or veggie) is great.  As always if life is too hectic I can make a dish for you for $15.  

There will also be a showing of the movie Forks Over Knives!!  Can't wait to see everyone!!!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: March Potluck!! Forks Over Knives!!
